raw_mentions:
The specific activity of the radiolabeled naturally-occurring NRSF (<sup>125</sup>I-NRSF) was 3 × 10^6 cpm/ng.
The radiolabeled NRSF (10 picomolar) was incubated for sixty minutes at 4°C with monolayers of MDA-MB-453 cells that were grown in a 24-well dish (Costar).
The chemical crosslinking reagent bis (sulfosuccinimidyl) suberate (BS<sup>3</sup>, Pierce) was added at 1 mM final concentration after one hour of binding at 4°C, followed by a brief wash with PBS.
